TMElyralab/MuseTalk

real-time high quality audio-driven lip-syncing for video dubbing

View on index

Related repos

  • audio-driven video dubbing with unlimited length and accurate lip sync
  • Automates video creation from text-to-speech and motion graphics
  • automates 2D lip sync animation from audio for games and cartoons
  • offline audio and video transcription with whisper, batch support, privacy focused
  • generates synchronized talking head videos from audio and reference images
  • open-source text-to-speech with voice cloning and emotion control
  • Lip-syncs any video to an audio track
  • Lip-sync videos to audio using a diffusion model
  • open source model for long-form, multi-speaker text-to-speech
  • Transcribes audio streams in real-time
